description: A variant of rumbustious (“boisterous and unruly”).

adjectives.description: rambunctious (comparative more rambunctious, superlative most rambunctious)

entries.meaning: (chiefly US, informal) Boisterous, energetic, noisy, and difficult to control.
examples: Synonyms: (slang) hyphy, robustious, rumbustious, (Northern England, Scotland) shandy, unruly, wild
The kids are being especially rambunctious today.
